Title: A Worthy Challenge: Sha of Doubt
Description:
$n, I need you to assemble a hearty group and lead them into the Temple of the Jade Serpent. Activate the Challenger's Orb therein, and vanquish the Sha of Doubt.

Return to me when you've completed this challenge, and I shall reward you handsomely.
ObjectivesText: Complete the Temple of the Jade Serpent Challenge Mode.

Objectives.Text: Complete the Temple of the Jade Serpent Challenge Mode
